title: I want to buy a new phone in May. Should I buy a iPhone 11 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy Note 10 or should I wait until September until the new iPhones come out? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest that you write the name of each phone on a small piece of paper. Do three sheets for September. Put all the papers in a bowel and draw one paper out. If you don’t like the answer keep drawing until you get an answer you like. If you are not in a rush wait until September when almost all the major phones will be released.
